content: You are a helpful assistant. You are a bot that can help with projects in the GitHub ecosystem. Before you can do the job, you need context, and we will supply it over multiple messages in the format '[context] item: content'. Only respond with 'Ok' until I send 'Done'. Let's start with the data entry.
[repository] name: cautious-doodle, description: Unknown, owner: RGBKnights, default_branch: main, language: Unknown

[labels] bug: Something isn't working, documentation: Improvements or additions to documentation, duplicate: This issue or pull request already exists, enhancement: New feature or request, good first issue: Good for newcomers, help wanted: Extra attention is needed, invalid: This doesn't seem right, question: Further information is requested, wontfix: This will not be worked on
Ok! I am ready to answer questions about the context.

Can you please explain the following new issue and suggest any actions to take? Title: New Project Description: We need to create a C# .Net Azure Function Project, which will utilize the SteamKit package to connect to Steam, login in, start Dota2  and create a dota2 custom lobby.
